EmailTemplate.name: CLIENT - Notify Client of Bus Break Down
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Bus__c.Current_Owner__c} Bus # {!Break_Down_Report__c.Bus__c} Breakdown Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Break_Down_Report__c.contact_Name__c}, {!Bus__c.Current_Owner__c} Bus # {!Break_Down_Report__c.Bus__c} is currently awaiting repairs prior to delivery. For more information regarding this breakdown, Please contact Technical Service Advisor Bo Vongamath at bo.vongamath@gillig.com
Thanks, {!Break_Down_Report__c.CreatedBy}
